name: Space Ninja スペース忍者
name_original: Space Ninja スペース忍者
description:
Space Ninja is a strategy based platformer where the player must use the physics of outer space to traverse solar systems. This is a beta version of level one. It features 3 courses and a 3D music video after completing them.

Controls:

'a' = Left
'd' = Right

'Space' = Jump

'j' = Close Cam

'k' = Far Cam
